mapper.select: SELECT c.complain_no, c.payment_no, c.complain_category, c.complain_title, c.complain_content, c.create_date, c.update_date, m.member_name, a.accom_name, ro.room_name, cc.complain_comment_content, cc.comment_date, h.host_name FROM complain c LEFT JOIN complain_comment cc ON c.complain_no = cc.complain_no LEFT JOIN payment p ON c.payment_no = p.payment_no LEFT JOIN reserve re ON p.reserve_no = re.reserve_no LEFT JOIN room ro ON re.room_no = ro.room_no LEFT JOIN accom a ON ro.accom_no = a.accom_no LEFT JOIN host h ON a.host_no = h.host_no LEFT JOIN member m ON re.member_no = m.member_no WHERE c.complain_no = #{complainNo}
mapper.insert:
